src:
Tarik Minat Warga Datang ke TPS, Panitia Pilkades di Sumenep Berikan Periksa dan Makan Gratis
07 Nov 2019, 16:23 by Iswantoro


Tarik Minat Warga Datang ke TPS, Panitia Pilkades di Sumenep Berikan Periksa dan Makan Gratis

KBRN, Sumenep : Untuk menarik minat masyarakat datang ke tempat pemungutan suara (TPS), Panitia Pemilihan Kepala Desa (P2KD) di Desa Karang Cempaka, Kecamatan Bluto, Kabupaten Sumenep, memberikan pemeriksaan kesehatan dan makan gratis bagi pemilih yang sudah mencoblos, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Ketua P2KD Karang Cempaka, M. Hariri mengatakan, pemeriksaan kesehatan dan makan gratis ini sebagai bentuk terima kasih kepada para pemilih yang sudah datang ke TPS, sekaligus upaya dari pihaknya untuk meningkatkan angka partisipasi.  
"Jadi susunan acaranya itu, setelah mencoblos, pemilih langsung diarahkan untuk makan dan melakukan pemeriksaan kesehatan gratis di tempat yang sudah disediakan panitia," ucapnya.
Hariri menuturkan, dalam pelayanan pemeriksaan kesehatan gratis itu, pihaknya mendatangkan petugas kesehatan dari Puskesmas Bluto.
Ia berharap kepada calon kades yang terpilih, bisa membawa desanya menjadi desa yang maju dan mandiri.
text:
Withdrawing Interest from Citizens Coming to the TPS, Pilkades Committee in Sumenep Gives Free Checks and Meals
Nov 7 2019, 16:23 by Iswantoro


Withdrawing Interest from Citizens Coming to the TPS, Pilkades Committee in Sumenep Gives Free Checks and Meals

KBRN, Sumenep: To attract the public's interest, come to the polling station (TPS), the Village Head Election Committee (P2KD) in Karang Cempaka Village, Bluto District, Sumenep Regency, provides health checks and free food for voters who have voted, Thursday (7 / 11/2019).
Chairman of the P2KD Karang Cempaka, M. Hariri said, the free health check and meal as a form of gratitude to the voters who had come to the polling station, as well as the efforts of his party to increase the participation rate.
"So, the composition of the event, after voting, voters were immediately directed to eat and conduct a free health check in the place provided by the committee," he said.
Hariri said, in the free health examination service, his party brought in health workers from the Bluto Community Health Center.
He hopes that the selected village head can bring his village into a developed and independent village.
